attributes.action: Remaining in both UK & EU is not possible. Run a UK Devolution referendum.
attributes.background: The mediaeval concept of the United Kingdom has outlived its usefulness. Romanticism & an unrealistic sense of self-importance are clouding the judgement of the British people & are obstacles to the prosperity of both Britain and the EU. Scotland will seek independence and so must England & Wales.

rejection.details:
If you want Scotland to have a second independence referendum, you can sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132667
